rooms.description: Spacious living area with minimalist Scandinavian design, ample natural light and neutral color palette.
Adjacent dining space integrated with living room for a seamless flow.
Functional kitchen area designed in Scandinavian style with clean lines and efficient storage solutions.
Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light, incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Cozy secondary bedroom ensuring privacy and functionality.
Additional bedroom designed for either guest use or as an extra living space, maintaining Scandinavian minimalism.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom with functional layout and aesthetic appeal.
Guest bathroom accessible from common areas, designed for convenience.

openings.description: Primary entrance with Scandinavian design elements aligning with Vastu principles of auspicious entry.
Large windows to maximize natural light and ensure positive energy flow, as per Vastu guidelines.

additional_features.description: Scandinavian-inspired swimming pool with clean lines and integration into the outdoor landscape for relaxation.
Lush garden area surrounding the pool, designed for tranquility and adherence to Vastu principles.
